alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Northern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 10 at 11:01AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brantley and east central Ware Counties through 1130 AM EST... At 1101 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Mudge, or 12 miles southeast of Waycross, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Nahunta, Hickox, Braganza and Fort Mudge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
